title: Happy faces of the new Cabinet
content: Onlanka News – By Janaka Alahapperuma (Pix by: President Media Unit) The newly appointed thirty seven (37) Cabinet Ministers and thirty nine (39) Deputy Ministers took oaths before President Mahinda Rajapaksa at Presidential Secretariat this afternoon on 23rd April. The President has decided to limit the Cabinet to under 40 members as he pledged to…
